extDescription.message: YouTube 홈페이지 피드의 새 동영상 알림 기능

messageNoFeedItems.description: Message when there are no feed items.

messageNeedLogIn.description: The subtitle when the user is not logged in.

messageSavedOptions.description: The message displayed after the user saves the settings.

buttonLogin.description: The text for the login button.

buttonLogout.description: The text for the logout button.

buttonSave.description: The text for the save button.

titleWhichEventTypes.message: Event types to show in the Feed:피드에 표시할 이벤트 유형:
titleWhichEventTypes.description: The title for the section for event type selection.

titleWhichFeedTypes.message: Feed types to show in the Feed: 피드에 표시할 피드 유형:
titleWhichFeedTypes.description: The title for the section for feed type selection.

label_video_uploaded.description: The label for the checkbox for uploaded videos.

label_video_favorited.description: The label for the checkbox for favorited videos.

label_video_rated.description: The label for the checkbox for rated videos.

label_video_liked.description: The label for the checkbox for liked videos.

label_video_commented.description: The label for the checkbox for commented videos.

label_load_friend_feed.description: The label for the checkbox for whether to load videos from friends.

label_load_subscription_feed.description: The label for the checkbox for whether to load videos from subscriptions.

eventType_video_uploaded.description: The entry title when a user uploads a new video.

eventType_video_favorited.description: The entry title when a user favorites a video.

eventType_video_rated.description: The entry title when a user rates a video.

eventType_video_liked.description: The entry title when a user likes a video.

eventType_video_commented.description: The entry title when a user comments on a video.

yearAgo.description: Timestamp singular - 1 year since an event.

monthAgo.description: Timestamp singular - 1 month since an event.

weekAgo.description: Timestamp singular - 1 week since an event.

dayAgo.description: Timestamp singular - 1 day since an event.

hourAgo.description: Timestamp singular - 1 hour since an event.

minuteAgo.description: Timestamp singular - 1 minute since an event.

secondAgo.description: Timestamp singular - 1 second since an event.

yearsAgo.description: Timestamp plural - years since an event.

monthsAgo.description: Timestamp plural - months since an event.

weeksAgo.description: Timestamp plural - weeks since an event.

daysAgo.description: Timestamp plural - days since an event.

hoursAgo.description: Timestamp plural - hours since an event.

minutesAgo.description: Timestamp plural - minutes since an event.

secondsAgo.description: Timestamp plural - seconds since an event.

viewCount.description: The number of views for a video.

labelMinutes.description: The text for the metric label for the options page.

labelPollingInterval.description: The label for an option field.

labelNumFeedItems.description: The label for an option field.

labelNumFeedItemsShown.description: The label for an option field.

labelUnreadCount.description: The label for an option field.

labelUnreadCountOnlyNew.description: The value for an option field.

labelUnreadCountEverything.description: The value for an option field.

labelOpenInNewTab.description: The label for an option field.

errorInvalidOptionValue.message: $optionName$ 값이 잘못되었습니다. $optionValueMin$와 $optionValueMax$ 사이의 값을 설정하시기 바랍니다.
errorInvalidOptionValue.description: The error message when a user specifies a wrong option value.
